gettingStarted.name: Getting started
gettingStarted.title: Build a custom application for your business, today.

content.main: Businesses can build an app quickly and seamlessly on the Fonoster platform.

lists.content: Find the perfect number for your project in the Marketplace.

lists.intro: 2. Build your app using our Smart APIs and SDKs.
lists.content: Create a smart video, voice or messaging application that meets your business needs without the clutter of unneeded features or historically burdensome customizations.

lists.intro: 3. Deploy your application to Fonoster Cloud.
lists.content: Once youâ€™ve customized your app, launch and get started quickly.
Improve your application over time with A/B testing.
